page.title: 12Hoole Tennis Club (2)
page.content: The senior teams play doubles in league matches. They play doubles in cup matches too but there are also a couple of singles games. The seniors have a lot of competitions at the club - Men's and Women's singles, Doubles, Mixed Doubles and some handicap events. Cups or shields are awarded to the winners. The only other other tennis club round here is in Penwortham.The High Schools round here also have a number of courts. Primary Schools do not usually have the facilties to allow tennis to be played although it is possible that the new game of Short Tennis may be introduced. (Ian Dewhurst and David Hesketh)
